{"id":918561367,"question_id":2662,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1679293731,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/918561367/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Knight Tour Configuration","memory":"42 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    int[][] dirs = new int[][]{{1,2}, {2,1}, {-1,2}, {-2,1} ,{1, -2}, {2, -1}, {-1,-2}, {-2, -1}};\n    \n    public boolean checkValidGrid(int[][] grid) {\n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n        \n        return  helper(0, 0, h, 0, grid);\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    \n    private boolean helper(int r, int c, int n, int val, int[][] grid){\n        if(r<0 || r>=n || c<0 || c>=n || val!=grid[r][c])\n            return false;\n        \n        if(val==n*n-1)\n            return true;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<8; i++){\n            \n            boolean bool = helper(r+dirs[i][0], c+dirs[i][1], n, val+1, grid);\n            if(bool)\n                return true;\n            \n        }\n        \n        return false;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-knight-tour-configuration","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
